citation: Proclamation under the Firearms Amendment Act 2007 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Firearms Amendment Act 2007

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the Firearms Amendment Act 2007 fix 23 December 2009 as the day on which the provisions of Part 3 of that Act commence.

14 December 2009

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. G. COX

Minister for Police and Emergency Management

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 December 2009

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Police and Emergency Management.
